verbose_text: Although the abundance of the DUX4 mRNA and protein results is extremely low (approximately 1 in 1000 FSHD muscle cell nuclei were detected with an abundant amount of DUX4 mRNA) [XREF_BIBR], it has been observed that the DUX4 expressing FSHD muscle nuclei show pathologic features consistent with DUX4 induced toxicity [XREF_BIBR].
